Acts 3:3-1-11

The Spirit of God uses people who are:

  1. Focused on the things of God.

    Acts 3:1

    Joshua 1:7-9

    John 14:23

  2. Paying attention to the needs of others.

    Acts 3:2

    Matthew 9:36-38

    John 4:34-35

    John 13:35

  3. Willing to share what they have.

    Acts 3:5-6

    James 2:15-17

    Matthew 25:37-40

  4. Willing to give God the credit.

    Acts 3:12-15

    1 Corinthians 1:26-31

    Matthew 5:16

How do you view the Holy Spirit in your life?
